subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Li Na became the first Chinese player to reach a Grand Slam singles final by knocking off top-seeded Caroline Wozniacki. She will face Kim Clijsters in the final.
snippet: Li Na became the first Chinese player to reach a Grand Slam singles final by knocking off top-seeded Caroline Wozniacki. She will face Kim Clijsters in the final.
